post.text: Beautiful evening in Kinston, North Carolina - thank you! Get out and VOTE!! You can watch tonight's rally here below! LETS MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Kurt
comment.text: The poles are saying you can't come back and win this, i call B.S!

replies.author: Benjamin
replies.text: It's going to be like Brexit in the UK on nov. 9 when we wake up! Go trump

replies.author: Kyle
replies.text: Agreed - Not even sure it's a come back - from everything we see he should be ahead. 👍🏻🇺🇸 Trump Train 2016
